name: NSURLConnectionDelegate
desc: A protocol that delegates of a URL connection implement to receive status about and provide feedback to the connection object.

items.name: func connection(NSURLConnection, willSendRequestFor: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the connection will send a request for an authentication challenge.

items.name: func connectionShouldUseCredentialStorage(NSURLConnection) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent to determine whether the URL loader should use the credential storage for authenticating the connection.

items.name: func connection(NSURLConnection, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Sent when a connection fails to load its request successfully.
